title: anonymousminer
author: anonymousminer
created_time: November 28, 2023, 09:19:07 PMLast edit: December 05, 2023, 12:06:52 AM by anonymousminer
content: OH MY this is a good one folks!Today we have the rarest of rare.  These are coldkeys made by the scam maker yogg.  They are all 1/1.  This is stolen art printed on them.  The original artist is Nina Y and she made them for the folks over at Cryptoart.  These are nonfunctional coldkeys and state as such.*Since this art was stolen, I'm going to give back to the arts.  50% of this auction will be donated to The O'Keefe Music Foundation*If you have never looked into this charity, hop on youTube and type in their name and see how awesome these kids are.If you are not interested in these items, please keep The O'Keefe Music Foundation in your thoughts the next time you might be looking for a charity to support.https://okmusicfoundation.org/Lot 1 - "See what tomorrow brings" Nonfunctional ColdkeyStarting bid: 0.0005BTCLot 2 - "Silver Mystic" Nonfunctional ColdkeyStarting bid: 0.0005BTCLot 3 - "Protectionism" Nonfunctional ColdkeyStarting bid: 0.0005BTCLot 4 - "Art Shibe" Nonfunctional ColdkeyStarting bid: 0.0005BTCLot 5 - "Crypto Greensleeves"Starting bid: 0.0005BTCSTARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: December 4th 2023 16:15EST (4:15PM New York Time)**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: PAYMENT: BTC: bc1qlylhtyh3q0chdf6e4qa87u9647ddxmxcge0f0vLN and LTC also accepted due to high fees on the BTC networkSHIPPING: ALL items will be sent to minerjones for reshipping.OWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: anonymousminer
comments.body: Donation has been made:$115 in fiat was 50% of the auction.  I upped it to $150 and then our very own minerjones added $100 to the total.    The O'Keefe Music foundation was paid $250 today.  Thank you geo and MJ!!  I'm not posting the receipt here as my personal information is on the donation receipt, however minerjones and geo should chime in as I've shown both of them the receipt.

I can confirm that I was notified of the total $250 donated and saw the receipt!I also sent in a donation of $100 to The O'Keefe Music Foundation. Thanks, Geophphreigh
